# signpostName

**Instance Property**

The developer-specified name of the custom metric represented by the object.

## Declaration

```swift
var signpostName: String { get }
```

## Reading data about the custom metric

- **signpostCategory**: The developer-specified category of the custom metric represented by the object.
- **totalCount**: The total number of occurrences of the captured custom metric.
